summary: Phase 6 WebWaka Rebrand Validation - Tested platform rebrand from eMarketWaka to WebWaka. Most user-facing pages correctly show WebWaka branding. Found remaining eMarketWaka references in Contact page and internal code files that need cleanup.

ui_bugs.issue: Shows eMarketWaka email addresses instead of WebWaka
ui_bugs.details: hello@emarketwaka.com and support@emarketwaka.com should be hello@webwaka.com and support@webwaka.com

action_items: Update Contact page emails from emarketwaka.com to webwaka.com (/app/saas-core/src/app/(marketing)/contact/page.tsx lines 62-63)
Update Admin page domain suffix from .emarketwaka.com to .webwaka.com (/app/saas-core/src/app/admin/page.tsx line 483)
Consider updating internal actor emails in lib files (subscription.ts, earnings-ledger.ts, etc.) from @emarketwaka.internal to @webwaka.internal
Consider updating localStorage keys from 'emarketwaka_' prefix to 'webwaka_' prefix
Consider updating DNS verification prefix from '_emarketwaka-verify' to '_webwaka-verify'
critical_code_review_comments: User-facing eMarketWaka references found in Contact page - HIGH priority fix needed
Admin page shows old domain suffix - MEDIUM priority fix needed
Internal code files have eMarketWaka references in actor emails and localStorage keys - LOW priority but should be cleaned up for consistency

Files with internal eMarketWaka references: domains.ts, subscription.ts, earnings-ledger.ts, partner-tenant-creation.ts, payout-readiness.ts, client-tenant-context.tsx, partner-attribution.ts, pos/page.tsx, vendor/page.tsx, store/page.tsx
context_for_next_testing_agent: WebWaka rebrand validation complete. Main user-facing pages (Home, Signup-v2, Login, Partner Portal, Billing Dashboard, Integrations Dashboard) correctly show WebWaka branding. Contact page and Admin page still have eMarketWaka references that need fixing. Internal code files have eMarketWaka references in actor emails and localStorage keys that should be cleaned up for consistency.

suites_api.overview_endpoint: PASS - Returns platform: WebWaka, 7 suites, 1 active, 5 solutions
suites_api.all_suites_endpoint: PASS - Returns all 7 suites with correct WebWaka naming
suites_api.all_solutions_endpoint: PASS - Returns 5 active solutions (POS, Store, Market, Inventory, Accounts)

marketing_home_page.tagline: PASS - Shows 'Digital Tools for African Success'

dashboards.billing_dashboard: PASS - Loads correctly, no eMarketWaka references
dashboards.integrations_dashboard: PASS - Loads correctly, no eMarketWaka references

otp_templates.webwaka_branding: PASS - All OTP message templates reference WebWaka

codebase_search.emarketwaka_references_found: YES - Found in 13 files (mostly internal actor emails and localStorage keys)

mocked_apis.otp_sms_delivery: MOCKED - Uses console.log instead of real SMS
mocked_apis.otp_email_delivery: MOCKED - Uses console.log instead of real Email
